title: Graphic Design & Typography Workshops
content:
Any recommendations on great type design and typography programs that are intensive 2-3 day workshops? Either in the U.S. or Europe.

Thanks!
author: dwf29

comments.content:
Check out the (5 week) Type@Cooper Condensed certificate program at the Cooper Union in New York City:  
 [http://coopertype.org/condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190458/http:/coopertype.org/condensed)
